aka: Gold Rush: Mine Rescue with Freddy and Juan
this_title: Gold Rush: Mine Rescue with Freddy & Juan Season 4
trans_title: Gold Rush: Mine Rescue with Freddy and Juan
introduction: Freddy Dodge and Juan Ibarra, the ultimate gold mining masterclass teachers. With 50 years of combined mining experience, their expert eyes, ingenious solutions, and clever hacks can dramatically increase even the worst gold operation.
chinese_title: Gold Rush: Mine Rescue with Freddy & Juan Season 4
